AI recruiters are officially a meme now.

In this video, we dive headfirst into the world of Classet’s “Joy” – the AI hiring bot that sounds like it moonlights as an Oscar Mayer wiener. From fake drive-thru interviews to hot dog costumes at Costco, we cover everything that makes these bots not the future of hiring… unless the future is deeply embarrassing.

It
title: THE REASON AI RECRUITERS ARE A JOKE!
